languages.text: "Я понимаю. В условиях военного времени Футфолу придется на время умерить свободу нравов. Станция не создаст вам проблем и окажет любую возможную помощь. Я донесу эту мысль до тех моих... партнеров, кому посчастливилось пережить правление госпожи Чорда".

"I understand. A time of war requires Footfall's public liberties to be curbed temporarily. This station will cause you no trouble and will provide any help that's required. I'll communicate that to those... partners of mine who've been lucky enough to survive Lady Chorda's rule."
languages.original_text: "Я понимаю. В условиях военного времени Футфолу придется на время умерить свободу нравов. Станция не создаст вам проблем и окажет любую возможную помощь. Я донесу эту мысль до тех моих... партнеров, кому посчастливилось пережить правление госпожи Чорда".

I'll communicate that to those... partners of mine who've been lucky enough to survive Lady Chorda's rule."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “我明白。在战争期间，我需要暂时限制一下落脚港的公共自由。这座星站不会再给您添任何麻烦，也会为您提供一切您需要的帮助。如果我那些伙伴……有幸在库尔达女士的统治下幸存的话，我会告诉他们的。”
languages.original_text: "I understand. A time of war requires Footfall's public liberties to be curbed temporarily. This station will cause you no trouble and will provide any help that's required. I'll communicate that to those... partners of mine who've been lucky enough to survive Lady Chorda's rule."

traits.locale_text: “我明白。在战争期间，我需要暂时限制一下落脚港的公共自由。这座星站不会再给您添任何麻烦，也会为您提供一切您需要的帮助。如果我那些伙伴……有幸在库尔达女士的统治下幸存的话，我会告诉他们的。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「分かった。戦時中は、フットフォールの自由が一時的に制限されても仕方がない。このステーションは、君には一切迷惑はかけない。必要であれば、手を貸す。これに関しては、私のパートナー達…運よくチョーダ様から生き延びた者達に伝えておく」
languages.original_text: "I understand. A time of war requires Footfall's public liberties to be curbed temporarily. This station will cause you no trouble and will provide any help that's required. I'll communicate that to those... partners of mine who've been lucky enough to survive Lady Chorda's rule."

traits.locale_text: 「分かった。戦時中は、フットフォールの自由が一時的に制限されても仕方がない。このステーションは、君には一切迷惑はかけない。必要であれば、手を貸す。これに関しては、私のパートナー達…運よくチョーダ様から生き延びた者達に伝えておく」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Lo entiendo. En tiempos de guerra es necesario restringir temporalmente las libertades de Paso. Esta estación no le causará ningún problema y le proporcionará toda la ayuda que necesite. Se lo comunicaré a aquellos... socios míos que han tenido la suerte de sobrevivir al gobierno de Lady Chorda».
languages.original_text: "I understand. A time of war requires Footfall's public liberties to be curbed temporarily. This station will cause you no trouble and will provide any help that's required. I'll communicate that to those... partners of mine who've been lucky enough to survive Lady Chorda's rule."

traits.locale_text: «Lo entiendo. En tiempos de guerra es necesario restringir temporalmente las libertades de Paso. Esta estación no le causará ningún problema y le proporcionará toda la ayuda que necesite. Se lo comunicaré a aquellos... socios míos que han tenido la suerte de sobrevivir al gobierno de Lady Chorda».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ich verstehe. In Kriegszeiten müssen Footfalls öffentliche Freiheiten vorübergehend eingeschränkt werden. Diese Station wird Euch keinen Ärger bereiten und wird jede erforderliche Hilfe bieten. Ich gebe das an meine ... Partner weiter, die das Glück hatten, Lady Chordas Herrschaft zu überleben."
languages.original_text: "I understand. A time of war requires Footfall's public liberties to be curbed temporarily. This station will cause you no trouble and will provide any help that's required. I'll communicate that to those... partners of mine who've been lucky enough to survive Lady Chorda's rule."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe. In Kriegszeiten müssen Footfalls öffentliche Freiheiten vorübergehend eingeschränkt werden. Diese Station wird Euch keinen Ärger bereiten und wird jede erforderliche Hilfe bieten. Ich gebe das an meine ... Partner weiter, die das Glück hatten, Lady Chordas Herrschaft zu überleben."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Je comprends. En temps de guerre, les libertés de chacun à Castel doivent être temporairement restreintes. Cette station ne vous causera aucun problème et fournira toute l'aide nécessaire. J'en parlerai à mes... associés qui ont eu la chance de survivre à la férule de dame Chorda. »
languages.original_text: "I understand. A time of war requires Footfall's public liberties to be curbed temporarily. This station will cause you no trouble and will provide any help that's required. I'll communicate that to those... partners of mine who've been lucky enough to survive Lady Chorda's rule."

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends. En temps de guerre, les libertés de chacun à Castel doivent être temporairement restreintes. Cette station ne vous causera aucun problème et fournira toute l'aide nécessaire. J'en parlerai à mes... associés qui ont eu la chance de survivre à la férule de dame Chorda. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Anlıyorum. Savaş zamanlarında Binliman'ın kamusal özgürlükleri geçici olarak sınırlandırılabilir. İstasyon sizin için bir sorun teşkil etmeyecek ve size gereken yardımı sağlayacak. Leydi Chorda'nın hükümdarlığından sağ kurtulacak kadar şanslı olan... Ortaklarımla iletişime geçeceğim."
languages.original_text: "I understand. A time of war requires Footfall's public liberties to be curbed temporarily. This station will cause you no trouble and will provide any help that's required. I'll communicate that to those... partners of mine who've been lucky enough to survive Lady Chorda's rule."

traits.locale_text: "Anlıyorum. Savaş zamanlarında Binliman'ın kamusal özgürlükleri geçici olarak sınırlandırılabilir. İstasyon sizin için bir sorun teşkil etmeyecek ve size gereken yardımı sağlayacak. Leydi Chorda'nın hükümdarlığından sağ kurtulacak kadar şanslı olan... Partnerlerimle iletişime geçeceğim."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
